General.Name: Jiangsu Fengshan Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Fengshan Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, and production of environment pesticide technical materials, preparations, and fine chemical intermediates in China. The company offers herbicides, pesticides, fungicides, intermediate and other products. Jiangsu Fengshan Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Yancheng, China.
General.Address: No.1 Xikang South Road, Yancheng, China, 224100
